程序包 org.openintents.tools.simulator.controller.sensor

  • 类概要 
    类 说明
    AccelerometerController
    AccelerometerController keeps the behaviour of the Accelerometer sensor (listeners, etc.)
    BarcodeReaderController
    BarcodeReader keeps the behaviour of the BarcodeReader sensor (listeners, etc.)
    GravityController
    GravityController keeps the behaviour of the Gravity sensor (listeners, etc.)
    GyroscopeController
    GyroscopeController keeps the behaviour of the Gyroscope sensor (listeners, etc.)
    LightController
    LightController keeps the behaviour of the Light sensor (listeners, etc.)
    LinearAccelerationController
    LinearAccelerationController keeps the behaviour of the LinearAcceleration sensor (listeners, etc.)
    MagneticFieldController
    MagneticFieldController keeps the behaviour of the MagneticField sensor (listeners, etc.)
    OrientationController
    OrientationController keeps the behaviour of the Orientation sensor (listeners, etc.)
    PressureController
    PressureController keeps the behaviour of the Pressure sensor (listeners, etc.)
    ProximityController
    ProximityController keeps the behaviour of the Proximity sensor (listeners, etc.)
    RotationVectorController
    RotationVectorController keeps the behaviour of the Rotation Vector sensor (listeners, etc.)
    SensorController
    SensorController is the class that defines the common fields and methods for sensors.
    TemperatureController
    TemperatureController keeps the behaviour of the Temperature sensor (listeners, etc.)
    WiiAccelerometerController
    WiiAccelerometerController keeps the behaviour of the WiiAccelerometer sensor (listeners, etc.)
